The corresponding value is an RoadGraph.Edge at the root of a tree of edges in the routing graph. This graph represents a probable path (or paths) of a vehicle within the routing graph for a certain distance in front of the vehicle, thus extending the user’s perspective beyond the “visible” horizon as the vehicle’s position and trajectory change.

Classes/RoadGraph/NotificationUserInfoKe.name: didTransitionAtEndpointKey

Protocols/NavigationService.html.name: NavigationService
Protocols/NavigationService.html.abstract: A navigation service coordinates various nonvisual components that track the user as they navigate along a predetermined route. You use MapboxNavigationService, which conforms to this protocol, either as part of NavigationViewController or by itself as part of a custom user interface. A navigation service calls methods on its delegate, which conforms to the NavigationServiceDelegate protocol, whenever significant events or decision points occur along the route.

Protocols/NavigationServiceDelegate.html.name: NavigationServiceDelegate
Protocols/NavigationServiceDelegate.html.abstract: A navigation service delegate interacts with one or more NavigationService instances (such as MapboxNavigationService objects) during turn-by-turn navigation. This protocol is the main way that your application can synchronize its state with the SDK’s location-related functionality. Each of the protocol’s methods is optional.

Protocols/Router.html.name: Router
Protocols/Router.html.abstract: A class conforming to the Router protocol tracks the user’s progress as they travel along a predetermined route. It calls methods on its delegate, which conforms to the RouterDelegate protocol, whenever significant events or decision points occur along the route. Despite its name, this protocol does not define the interface of a routing engine.

Protocols/RouterDataSource.html.name: RouterDataSource
Protocols/RouterDataSource.html.abstract: A router data source, also known as a location manager, supplies location data to a Router instance. For example, a MapboxNavigationService supplies location data to a RouteController or LegacyRouteController.

Classes/RouteController.html.name: RouteController
Classes/RouteController.html.abstract: A RouteController tracks the user’s progress along a route, posting notifications as the user reaches significant points along the route. On every location update, the route controller evaluates the user’s location, determining whether the user remains on the route. If not, the route controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/RouterDelegate.html.name: RouterDelegate
Protocols/RouterDelegate.html.abstract: A router delegate interacts with one or more Router instances, such as RouteController objects, during turn-by-turn navigation. This protocol is similar to NavigationServiceDelegate, which is the main way that your application can synchronize its state with the SDK’s location-related functionality. Normally, you should not need to make a class conform to the RouterDelegate protocol or call any of its methods directly, but you would need to call this protocol’s methods if you implement a custom Router class.

Classes/NavigationOptions.html#/s:16Mapb.abstract: Convienence factory-method for convenient bridging to Objective-C.

Enums/SpeechFailureAction.html#/s:16Mapb.name: mix

Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: apiError(instruction:options:underlying:)

Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: noData(instruction:options:)
Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.abstract: The speech engine did not fail with the error itself, but did not provide actual data to vocalize.

Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: unableToControlAudio(instruction:action:underlying:)
Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.abstract: The speech engine was unable to perform an action on the system audio service.

Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: unableToInitializePlayer(playerType:instruction:synthesizer:underlying:)
Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.abstract: The speech engine was unable to initalize an audio player.

Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: undefinedSpeechLocale(instruction:)
Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.abstract: There was no Locale provided during processing instruction.

Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: unsupportedLocale(locale:)
Enums/SpeechError.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.abstract: The speech engine does not support provided locale

Classes/MultiplexedSpeechSynthesizer.htm.name: managesAudioSession
Classes/MultiplexedSpeechSynthesizer.htm.abstract: Controls if this speech synthesizer is allowed to manage the shared AVAudioSession.

Classes/SystemSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.name: managesAudioSession
Classes/SystemSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.abstract: Controls if this speech synthesizer is allowed to manage the shared AVAudioSession.

Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.name: audioPlayer
Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.abstract: An AVAudioPlayer through which spoken instructions are played.

Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.name: managesAudioSession
Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.abstract: Controls if this speech synthesizer is allowed to manage the shared AVAudioSession.

Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.name: isSpeaking
Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.abstract: Checks if speech synthesizer is now pronouncing an instruction.

Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.name: init(accessToken:host:)
Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.abstract: Creates new MapboxSpeechSynthesizer with standard SpeechSynthesizer for converting text to audio.

Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.name: init(remoteSpeechSynthesizer:)
Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html#/s:.abstract: Creates new MapboxSpeechSynthesizer with provided SpeechSynthesizer instance for converting text to audio.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.name: speechSynthesizer(_:encounteredError:)
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the speech synthesizer encountered an error during processing, but may still be able to speak the instruction.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.name: speechSynthesizer(_:didSpeak:with:)
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the speech synthesizer finished pronouncing the instruction or encountered an error, from which it cannot recover.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.name: speechSynthesizer(_:didInterrupt:with:)
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when one spoken instruction interrupts another instruction currently being spoken.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.name: speechSynthesizer(_:willSpeak:)
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when a spoken instruction is about to be vocalized. Useful if it is necessary to give a custom instruction instead. Note that changing the distanceAlongStep property on SpokenInstruction will have no impact on when the instruction will be said.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: delegate
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: A delegate that will be notified about significant events related to spoken instructions.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: volume
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: Controls volume of the voice of the synthesizer. Should respect NavigationSettings.voiceVolume

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: locale
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: Locale setting to vocalization. This locale will be used as ‘default’ if no specific locale is passed for vocalizing each individual instruction.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: managesAudioSession
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: Controls if this speech synthesizer is allowed to manage the shared AVAudioSession.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: prepareIncomingSpokenInstructions(_:locale:)
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: Used to notify speech synthesizer about future spoken instructions in order to give extra time for preparations.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: stopSpeaking()
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: Tells synthesizer to stop current vocalization in a graceful manner

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.name: interruptSpeaking()
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html#/s:16M.abstract: Tells synthesizer to stop current vocalization immediately

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.name: speechSynthesizer
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.abstract: SpeechSynthesizing implementation, used to vocalize the spoken instructions. Defaults to MultiplexedSpeechSynthesizer

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.name: routeVoiceControllerDelegate
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.abstract: Delegate used for getting metadata information about route vocalization

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.name: playRerouteSound
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.abstract: If true, a noise indicating the user is going to be rerouted will play prior to rerouting.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.name: rerouteSoundPlayer
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.abstract: Sound to play prior to reroute. Inherits volume level from volume.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewControllerDidDismiss(_:byCanceling:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the navigation view controller is dismissed, such as when the user ends a trip.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didUpdate:with:rawLocation:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when movement of the user updates the route progress model.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didAdd:pointAnnotationManager:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Tells the receiver that the final destination PointAnnotation was added to the NavigationViewController.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:willArriveAt:after:distance:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called as the user approaches a waypoint.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didArriveAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user arrives at the destination waypoint for a route leg.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didSelect:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Tells the receiver that a waypoint was selected.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns whether the navigation view controller should be allowed to calculate a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldProactivelyRerouteFrom:to:completion:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Asks permission to proceed with found proactive reroute and apply it as main route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldPreventReroutesWhenArrivingAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user arrives at a waypoint.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:willRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately before the navigation view controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:modifiedOptionsForReroute:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: When reroute is happening, navigation view controller suggests to customize the RouteOptions used to calculate new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didRerouteAlong:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately after the navigation view controller receives a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didUpdateAlternatives:removedAlternatives:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when navigation view controller has detected a change in alternative routes list.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didFailToUpdateAlternatives:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when navigation view controller has failed to change alternative routes list.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didSwitchToCoincidentOnlineRoute:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when navigation view controller has automatically switched to the coincide online route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:willTakeAlternativeRoute:at:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when navigation view controller has detected user taking an alternative route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didTakeAlternativeRouteAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when navigation view controller has finished switching to an alternative route

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didFailToTakeAlternativeRouteAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when navigation view controller has failed to take an alternative route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didSelect:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Tells the receiver that the user has selected a continuous alternative route by interacting with the map view.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didFailToRerouteWith:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the navigation view controller fails to receive a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didRefresh:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately after the navigation view controller refreshes the route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:routeLineLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an LineLayer that determines the appearance of the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:routeCasingLineLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an LineLayer that determines the appearance of the casing around the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:routeRestrictedAreasLineLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an LineLayer that determines the appearance of the restricted areas portions of the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:willAdd:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Asks the receiver to adjust the default layer which will be added to the map view and return a Layer.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:waypointCircleLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an CircleLayer that marks the location of each destination along the route when there are multiple destinations. The returned layer is added to the map below the layer returned by navigationViewController(_:waypointSymbolLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:).

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:waypointSymbolLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns a SymbolLayer that places an identifying symbol on each destination along the route when there are multiple destinations. The returned layer is added to the map above the layer returned by navigationViewController(_:waypointCircleLayerWithIdentifier:sourceIdentifier:).

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shapeFor:legIndex:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns a FeatureCollection that represents the destination waypoints along the route (that is, excluding the origin).

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:roadNameAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called to allow the delegate to customize the contents of the road name label that is displayed towards the bottom of the map view.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldDiscard:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Allows the delegate to decide whether to ignore a location update.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didSubmitArrivalFeedback:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called to notify that the user submitted the end of route feedback.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: navigationView
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: NavigationView, that is displayed inside the view controller.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: routeLineTracksTraversal
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Controls whether the main route style layer and its casing disappears

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: annotatesIntersectionsAlongRoute
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the map annotates the intersections on current step during active navigation.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: showsContinuousAlternatives
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles displaying alternative routes.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: continuousAlternatives
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: AlternativeRoutes user might take during this trip to reach the destination using another road.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: voiceController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The voice controller that vocalizes spoken instructions along the route at the appropriate times.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: annotatesSpokenInstructions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the map annotates the locations at which instructions are spoken for debugging purposes.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: usesNightStyleWhileInTunnel
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Controls whether night style will be used whenever traversing through a tunnel. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: navigationOptions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The NavigationOptions object, which is used for the navigation session.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: routeOptions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The route options used to get the route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: indexedRouteResponse
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: A RouteResponse object constructed by MapboxDirections along with route index in it.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: route
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: A Route object constructed by MapboxDirections.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: routeResponse
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Current RouteResponse object, as provided by MapboxDirections.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: routeIndex
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The index of the route within the original RouteResponse object.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: directions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: A reference to a MapboxDirections service. Used for rerouting.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: navigationService
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The navigation service that coordinates the view controller’s nonvisual components, tracking the user’s location as they proceed along the route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: snapsUserLocationAnnotationToRoute
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Determines whether the user location annotation is moved from the raw user location reported by the device to the nearest location along the route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: sendsNotifications
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles sending of UILocalNotification upon upcoming steps when application is in the background. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: delegate
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The receiver’s delegate.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: shouldManageApplicationIdleTimer
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: If true, UIApplication.isIdleTimerDisabled is set to true in viewWillAppear(_:) and false in viewWillDisappear(_:). If your application manages the idle timer itself, set this property to false.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: init(for:routeIndex:routeOptions:navigationOptions:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes a NavigationViewController that presents the user interface for following a predefined route based on the given options.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: init(for:navigationOptions:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes a NavigationViewController that presents the user interface for following a predefined route based on the given options.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: init(for:routeIndex:navigationOptions:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes a NavigationViewController that presents the user interface for following a predefined route based on the given options.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: init(navigationService:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes a NavigationViewController with the given route and navigation service.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: show(_:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Shows a Status for a specified amount of time.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: hide(_:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Hides a given Status without hiding the status view.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: prepareViewLoading(routeResponse:routeIndex:routeOptions:navigationOptions:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Updates key settings before loading the view.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: prepareViewLoading(indexedRouteResponse:navigationOptions:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Updates key settings before loading the view.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: showsReportFeedback
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Shows a button that allows drivers to report feedback such as accidents, closed roads, poor instructions, etc. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: showsEndOfRouteFeedback
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Shows End of route Feedback UI when the route controller arrives at the final destination.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: showsSpeedLimits
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Shows the current speed limit on the map view.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: detailedFeedbackEnabled
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Controls whether or not the FeedbackViewController shows a second level of detail for feedback items.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: floatingButtonsPosition
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The position of floating buttons in a navigation view. The default value is MapOrnamentPosition.topTrailing.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: floatingButtons
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: The floating buttons in an array of UIButton in navigation view. The default floating buttons include the overview, mute and feedback report button. The default type of the floatingButtons is FloatingButton, which is declared with FloatingButton.rounded(image:selectedImage:size:) to be consistent.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: automaticallyAdjustsStyleForTimeOfDay
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: If true, the map style and UI will automatically be updated given the time of day.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: waypointStyle
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Allows to control highlighting of the destination building on arrival. By default destination buildings will not be highlighted.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: usesNightStyleInDarkMode
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Controls whether night style will be used whenever dark mode is enabled. Defaults to false.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.name: styleManager
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/s.abstract: Controls the styling of NavigationViewController and its components.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html.name: NavigationViewController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html.abstract: NavigationViewController is a fully-featured user interface for turn-by-turn navigation. Do not confuse it with the NavigationController class in UIKit.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: NavigationViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: The NavigationViewControllerDelegate protocol provides methods for configuring the map view shown by a NavigationViewController and responding to the cancellation of a navigation session.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html.name: RouteVoiceController
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html.abstract: A route voice controller monitors turn-by-turn navigation events and triggers playing spoken instructions as audio using the instance of SpeechSynthesizing type.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html.name: SpeechSynthesizing
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizing.html.abstract: Protocol for implementing speech synthesizer to be used in RouteVoiceController.

Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.name: SpeechSynthesizingDelegate
Protocols/SpeechSynthesizingDelegate.htm.abstract: The SpeechSynthesizingDelegate protocol defines methods that allow an object to respond to significant events related to spoken instructions.

Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html.name: MapboxSpeechSynthesizer
Classes/MapboxSpeechSynthesizer.html.abstract: SpeechSynthesizing implementation, using MapboxSpeech framework. Uses pre-caching mechanism for upcoming instructions.

Classes/MultiplexedSpeechSynthesizer.htm.name: MultiplexedSpeechSynthesizer
Classes/MultiplexedSpeechSynthesizer.htm.abstract: SpeechSynthesizingimplementation, aggregating other implementations, to allow ‘fallback’ mechanism.

Enums/SpeechError.html.name: SpeechError
Enums/SpeechError.html.abstract: A error type returned when encountering errors in the speech engine.

Classes/NavigationOptions.html.name: NavigationOptions
Classes/NavigationOptions.html.abstract: Customization options for the turn-by-turn navigation user experience in a NavigationViewController.

Classes/NavigationView.html.name: NavigationView
Classes/NavigationView.html.abstract: A view that represents the root view of the MapboxNavigation drop-in UI.
